PERSONA:
meet james, a 25-year-old african american man from a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. james is a high school graduate who has never pursued further education. he was born and raised in the u.s. and has never been married.

james identifies as a protestant and considers himself a born-again or evangelical christian, although he only attends religious services a few times a year. politically, he aligns himself with the democratic party and holds moderate to conservative views.

james comes from a middle-income family, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duties seriously. despite his conservative leanings, he is an ardent supporter of the democratic party.

in his free time, james enjoys browsing the internet, which he does almost constantly. however, he has not been involved in any volunteering activities. james leads a simple life, deeply rooted in his religious and cultural beliefs, and strives to uphold traditional values while navigating the modern world.
